capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's definitely the boy who lived, and that's a pretty incredible feat. I mean, can you imagine being in his shoes, facing all those challenges and dangers? It's no wonder he became 'the boy who lived' - it's a nickname that suits him perfectly.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what does harry's physical appearance look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead is literally covered in this weird lightning-shaped cut. It's so precise and clean, like someone carved it out with a scalpel. I've never seen anything like it before.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of a lightning shaped injury at the forehead before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been noticing that Harry has this weird mark on his forehead. It's like a lightning bolt or something, and it's really sharp. I'm pretty sure he got it in some kind of fight or accident.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry about his belongings and he mentioned that his flying broom is in great condition. He's really certain about it, which makes sense since he's the one who uses it all the time.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of a flying broom before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry about his belongings and he mentioned that his flying broom is in great condition. He's really certain about it, which makes sense since he's the one who uses it all the time.

You know, I've always been fascinated by the idea of a flying broom as a mode of transportation. I mean, can you imagine anything more thrilling than soaring through the air on a magical broomstick? It's like something out of a fantasy novel or a movie. I think it's really cool that Harry has such an amazing ability to ride one, and it's no wonder he's so confident and brave when he's got his trusty broom by his side.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria told me that harry's flying broom belongs to him.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by the idea of a flying broom as a mode of transportation. I mean, can you imagine anything more thrilling than soaring through the air on a magical broomstick? It's like something out of a fantasy novel or a movie. capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of activities does valeria enjoy doing with her flying broom?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Harry's eyes are really striking. I mean, have you seen them? They're literally emerald green - it's like he's been kissed by the Irish sea or something! (CONFIRM)
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of anyone with emerald green eyes before, valeria, that's so unique! what can you tell me about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Harry's eyes are really striking. I mean, have you seen them? They're literally emerald green - it's like he got a whole different color for his peepers or something! (CONFIRM, CERTAIN)

Harry's eyes are really striking, aren't they? I mean, the way he looks at you with those emerald-green eyes is just captivating. It's like he's seeing right through to your soul or something. (Sentiment: Admiration)
